parameters: Initiliazes variables important for the dash and stealth cape mechanics
Other guards can see through this guard
sets the collider to a circle
The note (top left) is a line of sight plugin with the following parameters
poly = the shape of the area in which it detects events
A = the switch it turns on, this can be a self switch (A,B,C,D) this can be a number for the a switch
0 = the event Id it is searching for with 0 being the player, does not need to be shown
Guard will move to players last known location then search
Pathfinds to Gobber's last known location
Guard Searching if he loses Gobber
path finds back to original space
changes the direction of the guard to it's original direction
this.event() = the event that this is called in
23 = the variable that the direction is stored in
other guards can see through this guard
